snippet: Clerics and politicians are struggling to deal with a generation of educated young women carving out independent lives in a tradition-bound society, away from fathers and husbands.
abstract: Clerics and politicians in Iran are struggling to deal with a generation of educated young women carving out independent lives in a tradition-bound society, away from fathers and husbands.
lead_paragraph: Clerics and politicians are struggling to deal with a generation of educated young women carving out independent lives in a tradition-bound society, away from fathers and husbands.

headline.seo: Single Women Slowly Gain Acceptance in Iran
headline.main: Single Women Gaining Limited Acceptance in Iran
headline.print_headline: Single Women Gaining Limited Acceptance in Iran
